name: Falloff Blocks
description:
Stack colorful blocks on various moving objects, a seesaw, roundabout, farm truck and even a container ship!

Build point as your stack of blocks builds higher and higher, while trying not to let them fall off.

Sounds simple, it's not, the ship moves up and down, the roundabout is rotating and the seesaw doesn't stay level for long!

Addictive gameplay with stylish environments make this a game you'll want to play over and over, and over!

Fun music jingles make for a totally fun game.
